content.text: Hi I'm a Filipino mom. What about you?
I'm a family-oriented person who likes to drive a minivan because it is roomy and comfortable.
What do you like about minivans?
I like that they are roomy and comfortable. I have a large family and we all need to fit in the car.
I agree, minivans are very practical. I have a bicycle and my husband and I love working with our hands and building things together.
That sounds like fun! I enjoy working with my hands too. I like to fix things around the house and build things in my spare time.
What do you like to build?
I like to build furniture and other things around the house. I also like to work on my car.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm not very handy, but I enjoy watching my husband work on projects.
It's a great skill to have. I'm glad that your husband is handy.
Me too! He's very good at it
